<h1 align="center">VS Code Language extension Parrot for VS Code</h1>

### Contributing

All contributions are welcomed!

* [repository](https://github.com/parrot-language/syntax-vsc)

### License
This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [LICENSE](https://github.com/parrot-language/syntax-vsc/blob/HEAD/LICENSE) file for details.

### Thanks to
* [Swift Github](https://github.com/apple/swift)

                            #(((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((//********                                                                                     
                    */& #((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((///******

            & #((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((((////************#
